TopicTitle: I have no models of anything, everything is completely empty!

Articles.Content:
![732a7d7adc7061a94cf2a9254dca8e78.jpg](http://gyazo.com/732a7d7adc7061a94cf2a9254dca8e78.jpg)

Notice my menu on the left, completely empty. How am i gonna build spaceships from nothing?

is this career or sandbox? if it's career and it's first time playing try to go for the first tab in the menu (pods), because im not sure there is something under the wings section.

If it's sandbox try to verify cache in steam or reinstall the game if not using steam, if all else fails you will need to post some logs.

> 
> is this career or sandbox? if it's career and it's first time playing try to go for the first tab in the menu (pods), because im not sure there is something under the wings section.
> If it's sandbox try to verify cache in steam or reinstall the game if not using steam, if all else fails you will need to post some logs.

I fixed it. For some reason, it didnt download them, so when i verified the cache on Steam, it downloaded 415 files, that fixed the problem.
